snippet: The latest trend in Rust Belt Catholicism, the Mass mob, is bringing thousands of suburban Catholics to visit the struggling urban churches of their parents and grandparents.
abstract: Latest trend in Rust Belt Catholicism is Mass mob, movement that is bringing thousands of suburban Catholics to visit struggling urban churches of their parents and grandparents; movement is part heritage tour and part mixer, and is attracting much-needed contributions for urban churches.
lead_paragraph: The latest trend in Rust Belt Catholicism, the Mass mob, is bringing thousands of suburban Catholics to visit the struggling urban churches of their parents and grandparents.

headline.main: At Forlorn Urban Churches, Mass Gets Crowded in a Flash
headline.print_headline: At Forlorn Urban Churches, Mass Gets Crowded in a Flash
